name: 动物模型丨柯基 MG_CORGI (animal)
description:
一款niji风格的修勾模型，主要生成柯基

niji生成图片训练，对风格复现明显，输入触发词：mangguo_keji可以直出图，如例图所示均为t2i直出+高清修复（无controlnet)

Steps:20~30    推荐:320*480（高清修复）  Sampler：DDIM

Prompts：mangguo_keji,water under,

Neg_Prompts:easynegative,(((pubic))), ((((pubic_hair)))),sketch, duplicate, ugly, huge eyes, text, logo, monochrome, worst face, (bad and mutated hands:1.3), (worst quality:2.0), (low quality:2.0), (blurry:2.0), horror, geometry, (bad hands), (missing fingers), multiple limbs, bad anatomy, (interlocked fingers:1.2), Ugly Fingers, (extra digit and hands and fingers and legs and arms:1.4), crown braid, ((2girl)), (deformed fingers:1.2), (long fingers:1.2),succubus wings,horn,succubus horn,succubus hairstyle,girl,

A Niji style revision model that mainly generates Koki

Niji generates image training, with obvious style reproduction. Input trigger word: mangguo_ Keji can display images directly, as shown in the example images, all of which are t2i direct output+high-definition repair (without controllnet)

Steps: 20-30 Recommendation: 320 * 480 (high-definition repair) Sampler: DDIM

抖音和小红书同名，不定时更新关于一些ai的探索和图片分享

爱发电可以请我喝杯奶茶：https://afdian.net/a/mango_AI

小红书：芒果

商业合作联系：V1643459514
